title: CachyOS Is an Arch Linux Distribution for (Almost) Everyone
author: Jack Wallen
description: If you're feeling adventurous and want an operating system that will allow you to grow your skills, CachyOS is a great option.
cntitle: CachyOS 是一个面向（几乎）所有人的 Arch Linux 发行版
cndescription: 如果你想尝试一个能提升你技能的操作系统，CachyOS 是个不错的选择。
